summary:
Mallorca, also called Majorca, is the biggest island in the Balearic Islands group, which belongs to Spain. It's the seventh-largest island in the Mediterranean Sea. Palma, the island's capital, is also the capital of the Balearic Islands region.

This island is a famous vacation spot, especially for people from the Netherlands, Germany, and the UK. Its airport is very busy, serving millions of passengers each year. Nearby small islands, Cabrera and Dragonera, add to Mallorca's charm. The island's anthem is "La Balanguera."
title: Mallorca
